summary: Dumped by her boyfriend just three weeks before their wedding, Lola enlists her close friends for a series of adventures she hopes will help her come to terms with approaching 30 as a single woman.
cast: Greta Gerwig|Joel Kinnaman|Zoe Lister-Jones|Hamish Linklater|Bill Pullman|Debra Winger|Maria Dizzia|Jonathan Sale|Ebon Moss-Bachrach|Adriane Lenox|Ray Iannicelli|Kathryn Kates|Jay Pharoah|Cheyenne Jackson|Kena Onyenjekwe|Jeanine Moss|Micah Joe Parker|Parisa Fitz-Henley|Bill Kocis|Izzy Ruiz|John Tobias|Victor Cruz|Sándor Técsy|Rob Yang|Matthew Bowerman|Franco Bulaon|Athos Cakiades|Omar Capra|Nikki Casseri|Dina Cataldi|Tony Kost|Anne Senelly Kyle|Mark J. Parker|Nicole Roderick|Angela Marie Roy|Jen Snow|William Henderson White
title: Lola Versus
